snippet.title: Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire is the second expansion for the award-winning game, Guild Wars 2. As the balance of magic comes undone, lead your allies in the hunt for the arrogant god Bathazar, whose scorched earth campaign against the Elder Dragons threatens the very existence of Tyria. Visit the official expansion site at https://guildwars2.com/pathoffire for more information, or https://buy.guildwars2.com to pre-order.
